storyInfo: Though the doubt surrounding Cecelia grows and grows, Ezell still makes a pledge to her: I promised to help you find your mother, and I will.

attributes.content: And you left, just like that?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: There's no point bickering with her, and I'm half sure she was only there to hold me up anyway. If the girl's not in the hospital anymore, then we first need to confirm her whereabouts.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: How's your end?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I took a shortcut. I'll be at the Basilica in a minute.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: If the situation allows, send an order to cooperate from the Lateran Church to the Notarial Hall.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I questioned the hospital staff. It was a trainee executor who admitted the girl, said he picked up a lost child and couldn't find her parents.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Procedure dictates he bring her back to the Notarial Hall.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Even if he's not there yet, I can find his location through the Hall's system.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I've gotta say, you being so capable isn't good news for me.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Oh, yeah, and after you report, stay there in the Basilica for now.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Oh? You don't need my help?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: No. I feel like something's waiting to happen.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Didn't something already happen?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You know who I'm talking about.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Anyway, hang back there. You might be more useful to me that way.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Are you worried about me?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I just don't want you scampering all over the place. Let me... conserve my energy.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: No problem, Shimmering Vigil.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Use my real name!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: There's so many people here...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Which makes it harder to find us.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: This is Pagus Ambrosius. Have you been here before, Cecelia?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Mamma used to say she'd go to Ambrosius to buy things. Maybe she's here?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Tell me more about your mamma being taken. What exactly happened?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Mamma got ill... this morning, I was talking to Mamma. Then someone came... from the Notarial Hall, with white clothes on.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Then after he left, people with gowns came in, and took Mamma away.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: (The Notarial Hall... Could this really be a kidnapping case...? Something doesn't feel right.)
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Where were you then, Cecelia? Did they see you? Where did your pap√† go?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Is this going to help me find Mamma?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Er, not for certain... it's just, if you can tell me more, I might be able to find some leads.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Cecelia, my darling Cecelia... you have to hide. Don't let them find you...
attributes.name: Sickly Mother

attributes.content: In that case, please tell me her parents' family name, her home address, identity number, and your blood or legal relationship to her.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: If you have proper grounds to leave with Cecelia, you can tell me, and I'll take it into account in my decision.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Eze...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Hold on, Cecelia.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Hello. It's me.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Yes, I'm in Pagus Ambrosius right now.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Right, I'm helping this child find her mother.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Return to the Hall? Alright, I was about to... I'll be roughly half an hour?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Right, copy that.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: M... Mister Ezell, are you going to take me to the Notarial Hall?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: That's right. Is something...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I'll give you a word of advice! If you truly care about Cecelia, then don't give her up to the Notarial Hall or the Lateran Church! Or else, you'll regret it!
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Cecelia... I'm guessing you don't want to go to the Hall?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Mamma said... I can't go there...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: But! If they can tell me where Mamma is, then I will... I can go!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Mamma's got an illness... I'm really worried...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Cecelia... let me ask you one more thing. Had you seen that Liberi from just now?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: No. I don't like her...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Just give me a moment to think and I'll be with you, okay?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Cecelia's mother forbade her from going to the Notarial Hall, or from approaching executors.
An executor showed up before Cecelia's mother went missing.
Cecelia's mother went missing.
Cecelia was almost abducted by a suspicious Liberi, whose name is likely 'Patia.'
Patia said Cecelia cannot be given over to the Notarial Hall or the Lateran Church.
And finally, something's... wrong with Cecelia's halo.
Would it even be possible for me to extricate myself from this, at this point?
No...
Don't run away, Ezell...
Think...
What should you do?
Mister... Ezell, in the hospital, you said, you would help me find Mamma. Is that true?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Is that... still true, now?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: This can't be the only solution.
It's true, Cecelia. I promised you.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: We're not going to the Notarial Hall.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Do you still remember where your home is? I need to find someone else who knows your mother.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I'll help you find her. That's my promise.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Thank you, Mister Ezell!
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I don't know how to get back home from here. I've never been here before.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: But, if we go back to where I saw you, Mister... I know where my house is from there.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Not a problem. We'll take a different route back to Stevonus.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Welcome back, Mostima.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Time sure does fly, Your Holiness.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: What news do you bring this time?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Relax, it won't be as bad as that one time.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Here's the physical report I mentioned before... Last page is a brief from Stevonus Central's head doc.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: ...Considerably cautious wording.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Mostima, what is your view?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Going by the doctor who did the diagnosis and checkup, this report belongs to... an eight-year-old Sankta girl.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: All the details point to her being a Sankta, anyway.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Empath index isn't too high, but considering her age and physical condition, it's within acceptable range.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Question is these few figures here... My own checkups report similar results.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: But she's not even twelve yet. Never held a patron firearm. It's hard to imagine she's got the ability to violate any commandments. Outward appearances shoot down any chance she's fallen, either.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Doesn't leave very many possibilities. I think you'd have a better idea than me.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: If she's not fallen, another possibility is...
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: No. It's just as at odds with her appearance. Progeny like that aren't able to obtain halos.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Right, normally they can't. But we don't have many cases to go by, anyway.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Where is this child currently located? Where's Fiammetta?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Kid's out of Stevonus Central Hospital. Fiammetta's tracing her.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Apparently, it was one of the Hall's trainee executors who checked her in. Velliv, Fiammetta wants you to order the Notarial Hall to cooperate. She's on her way there right now.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: The Notarial Hall...
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Silver linings, am I right?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: She just wants an order to cooperate? Is Fiammetta alone going to be enough?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: You forget that big conference in the Basilica? Thought you were more cautious than that, Velliv.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: How much does this trainee executor know about the child?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: No way to be sure. Hospital describes him as just a conscientious guy who 'saw a lost child and did the right thing,' at least when he admitted her.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Let Fiammetta handle it for now.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Yes, Your Holiness.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Aren't you going to participate, Mostima?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Not at the moment.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: While we were in Stevonus Central, Fiammetta met this Liberi who used to be Pontifica Cohors too.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: She likely made contact with the child, but according to the info Fiammetta sent back, it's not gone smoothly for her, whatever it was she wanted to do.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: But either way, she definitely used some apostate language.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Hm... you stay in the Basilica, then.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Vel, no need to jump the gun.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Any issues with the envoys arriving?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Two detachments remain. Forecasts say they will arrive on time.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Very good then.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: We'll wait a bit.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Patia, we're sorry, we lost them.
attributes.name: Panicked Underling of Patia

attributes.content: Forget it. He came to Pagus Ambrosius on purpose. The crowds are massive here, and all the alleys... For what looks like a novice, this executor's got a surprisingly decent hand on the ropes.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Ugh, this is a massive wrench in the plan. How could she fall straight into an executor's hands...
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Who could it be now... Oren?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Things are getting tricky, Patia.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: What, are you calling to mock me for it?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Not at all. Jokes are reserved for when things go without a hitch.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I've got good news and bad news. Which do you wanna hear first?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: And you said you wouldn't joke... The bad news.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Bad news is, the Lateran Church caught wind already, and they're officially sending someone to intervene. Guess who got tasked?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: ...Fiammetta.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Bingo!
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I'm eager to hear what the good news could be.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Good news is, it's just Fiammetta. Mostima's been kept at the Basilica.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: That counts as good enough. But the news I want to hear is what you are doing right now.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Real sharp of you. Because Mostima's been left behind, me and her have switched report times. Which means I'm free right now. How's that? Jumping for joy?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Not‚Äîa‚Äîchance‚Äîin‚Äîhell.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Also, Oren, I'm warning you, stop acting like you've got such a wealth of experience. I joined up with the Guide long before you did.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Alright, got it. I know I could never compete with your Miss Veter... hey, don't hang up, hold on, listen, I need you to hold Fiammetta off.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: What about you?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: I'll be fetching Cecelia.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Why don't you hold Fiammetta off and I fetch Cecelia?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Ease up on the temper, okay? You know exactly why.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Besides, if you intercept Fiammetta, then no one's harmed even if you fail. And if I go handle that executor, the chances I succeed are better than yours.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Do you hate the Sankta, Patia?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: What are you asking?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Answer the question.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I don't hate Sankta. What I hate is Liberi who put them up on an altar with absolutely no self-awareness.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: If you don't care about Sankta, then you'll never know what makes them tick.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: What, are you trying to say you can get that executor to hand Cecelia to you because you're a Sankta, just like that?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: You've got it all wrong. Halos allow Sankta to sense each other, and better understand each other, but that's not to say we all get to live in a happy hive mind.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Emotional links, ones that are a little too strong, can be a weakness at certain times.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Sankta are just too accustomed to them. But once something abnormal happens to you, you get stuck with these... tiny little doubts that crop up.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Is that why you're on our side?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: On your side?
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Nah, Patia. I'm not 'on your side.'
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: We're just going the same way by pure coincidence.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Oren, who were you on comms with?
You really love rooftops, Mostima.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Same to you. All the Legati love a rooftop run, don't they, Oren?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Ooh... I saw you this morning. Props to you for that one.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: That was you, huh? I thought I was staring at someone's rooftop planters.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Huh? C'mon, don't I look good? It's the latest fashion in Victoria.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: All I know is fashion doesn't mean dyeing your hair so it clashes with all of you.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You're such a Victoriaphile, Oren.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: It comes with the job. The glorious Nuntii Apostolici demand a certain bearing.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Wanna guess at my job, then? Aren't you curious why I went to see the old weirdo out of nowhere?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: It's so secret, it might just sink Laterano...
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Stop!
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: I don't wanna know.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: You don't?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I was really hoping I'd get another helping hand.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Instead of meeting up with Fiammetta, you're going to recruit him?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Don't be like that, Velliv, I'm devoted to you, heart and soul.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Not one more disgusting joke out of you, Oren Argiolas.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: C'mon, even I have feelings.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Wow, that's the first I've heard of them.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: If you two have the time to chat, you'd better spend it rewriting your reports.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Hm? Is something wrong with my report?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Guess how many seconds it took me to read it?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Uh... can't you combine my word count with Fiammetta's? We've written ten k or so, if you add us together.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: I'll have you know I spent five hours scribbling away like a monk.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Mostima's returned to Laterano more times than you had true facts in there, and I wouldn't mind reducing your allowance to match it.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I'm real worried, Oren.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Penny for your thoughts, Mostima.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: What if Lemuen ends up like Velliv eventually?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: You know how to paint a scary picture. I'm getting shivers.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Seems you two have all the time in the world.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Oren's a busy bee, don't you know.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: *Sigh* That's right, I'm busy-busy. In fact, it's about time I got going.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: Until next time, my dear Velliv. I'll bring you some choux fingers.
attributes.name: Oren

attributes.content: What are you looking at me for? I wasn't laughing.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Oren Argiolas... pray you do not fall into my hands.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Seniora Fiammetta, Ezell's already on his way back to the Hall. If we could just ask you to wait a little longer.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: I'll bring you some tea.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: I'm fine.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Do you personally know Ezell?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I do. He's a trainee under me. Oh, right, you can call me Richele.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Official

attributes.content: How's his work? Anything dubious, ordinarily?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Dubious? Uh, does refusing to work overtime count? He's always gone like a ghost the moment we clock out.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: But he's fairly good at his work. His practical training period's almost over, too, and he should be picking up a good score.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I don't really mind him skipping overtime, though... he's a kid. Let him have his easy days. Once he gets onto field work, there's no line between on or off duty.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Bring up his position.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Are you really so suspicious of Ezell? I'd trust him well enough at this...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Huh? Oh no... He really isn't moving for the Notarial Hall at all, huh?! What's he doing...?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Let me see!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: With this orientation... he's heading back to Stevonus.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Seniora Fiammetta! Wait! If he really was up to something, he wouldn't leave his locator on. Just give this some thought, please.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: There's also the possibility this marker's a decoy.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: If he was faking the marker, then his decoy would be walking on back to the Notarial Hall like it should.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Seniora Fiammetta, please, put your trust in the Notarial Hall's executors.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I'm not saying I don't trust him. I work here too.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Call it clearing him of suspicion.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Hm...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Oh? We've lost his signal. You only just now remembered, Ezell? Still so young...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: But if it was off to begin with, I wouldn't have defended him. Fine luck, you little brat...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I don't know what your plans are... but it's his deed, his to bear.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Getting some education from you can't do him bad, Seniora Fiammetta.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Ah. Welcome back, Federico.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Real frantic day in Stevonus today... wouldn't you say?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Was there a complication with the body?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I guess the whole show breezed right by you... The body's fine, the Ecclesia Requietum has it now.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Oh.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Don't you wanna ask what 'show?'
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: What 'show.'
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Never mind. Forget I said anything.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: But now that Feoria lady's dead, your trail's run dry, hasn't it?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: There are other options.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Like what?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Richele Colombo, I require that you access Feoria La Porta's travel logs.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I'm never gonna get used to the way you speak.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I can give them a lookup, but I just want you to know, I'm not writing your report.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: I will submit an application and report in accordance with followup investigation procedure.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Sure, okay.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Let's see...
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Hmmm?
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: Did you find something?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: That's a curiosity. Come look at this.
attributes.name: Richele

attributes.content: How long do you plan on following me?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Drop the act. I've had more and more eyes on me since the moment I stepped out of the Hall.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You people should learn how to spy a little more subtly.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: What can you do? They're not from service backgrounds, and they haven't been trained for long. They're doing great for where they're at.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Done pretending, Patia?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: As long as you don't get in my way, I don't intend on bothering you.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Look, we have our past. Let me give you a word of advice.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: No matter who you've seen, who's directing you, what you plan to do‚Äîit's still not too late to pull back.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Who's directing me?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: And who's directing you, Fiammetta?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Don't make an enemy of the Lateran Church, Patia.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: And if I said my goal was to be an enemy of the Lateran Church?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: ...I can still act as though I never heard that.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You're the same as before, aren't you?
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: You'll protect anything and everything... just for a tiny bit of friendship.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: Shame I'm not who I used to be.
attributes.name: Patia

attributes.content: You can act like you didn't hear. But I can't act like I didn't say it.
attributes.name: Patia
